content.data:
[Y]Sound Polish
[W]Small details improve feel.
[c][m.]
[W]Use short cues for action feedback and
[W]reserve melody space for identity.
[W]Dynamic channel priority prevents
[W]effects from swallowing important
[W]tones.
[c][m.]
[G]- Reserve one effect channel.
[G]- Keep motifs short.
[G]- Use silence for contrast.
[m][m-]
[Y]AUDIO NOTE
[C]If every sound is loud, none are
[C]special.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
